summary.span: 由 JScript 擲回的例外狀況，以通知 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 主機或程式，發生錯誤。

span.span: The exception that is thrown by JScript to notify a common language runtime (CLR) host or program that an error occurred.

summary.span: 通常會採用 列舉值。

span.span: A usually takes a enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A還有而且可以傳遞至透過主機。A is also an and can be passed to the host through .

summary.span: 取得一個介於 0 (最嚴重) 和 4 (最不嚴重) 之間表示錯誤嚴重性的數字。

span.span: Gets a number between 0 (most severe) and 4 (least severe) that indicates the severity of the error.

summary.span: 預設為 0。

span.span: 0 is the default.

value.span: 介於 0 和 4 之間的數字。

span.span: A number between 0 and 4.
